qq.twosnp

Source: R/colocqq.R
qq.twosnp.Rd

reconstruct joint model ioutput for two snp models

qq.twosnp(b1, b2, g1, g2, vb1, vb2, vg1, vg2, fx, fz, rho, v1, v2, eta, N)

Arguments

b1

coef for snp X, trait 1
b2

coef for snp X, trait 2
g1

coef for snp Z, trait 1
g2

coef for snp Z, trait 2
vb1

var(coef) for snp X, trait 1
vb2

var(coef) for snp X, trait 2
vg1

var(coef) for snp Z, trait 1
vg2

var( coef ) for snp Z, trait 2
fx

MAF of X
fz

MAF of Z
rho

cor(X,Z)
v1

variance of trait 1
v2

variance of trait 2
eta

cor(Y1,Y2)
N

number of samples

Value

list of coefficients and their (co-)variances that would be expected from a joint model

Details

The SNPs are X and Z, the traits are 1 and 2

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Details

Author

Chris Wallace

Developed by Chris Wallace, Claudia Giambartolomei.
